name: Private Jake Erwin
descriptions: Private Jake Erwin is an NCR soldier found at the NCR Embassy in New Vegas in 2281.
Jake is a known prankster who is currently very close to being reprimanded. He mentions a prank he is planning to play on Ambassador Crocker if one asks him about it.

topics.topic_text: Want to play a hand of Caravan?

topics.response_text: {Laughs}Nice try. Care to try your luck again?
Not too bad. How about we play again?

topics.topic_text: I'm all done playing for now.
topics.response_text: Okay. If you want to play again sometime, let me know.
Didn't you save President Kimball? You're my new hero!
Us troopers mostly come to the Strip for our R&R. We blow off some steam by gambling, drinking, partying, or fighting.
What have you heard? I know people think I'm a little on the wild side, but I'm just trying to have fun, you know?

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the Ambassador?
topics.response_text: He's a little stiff and stuffy. Doesn't leave the office that much, always surrounds himself with papers and reports.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Captain Pappas?
topics.response_text: She may be a bit of a hardass, but she's the best damn Captain we've had here. I'd be careful around her. You don't want to get on her bad side.
Yeah, I've got a few ideas that I'm working on. Maybe I'll let you in on it once I have something.

topics.topic_text: That doesn't sound like a good idea.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I know. That's why I'm not really going to do it.
